item.title: Bob Munden The Fastest Gun Who Ever Lived
item.media:title: Bob Munden The Fastest Gun Who Ever Lived
item.description:
From Black Spine Junka 4 You will be amazed at the skills that Bob Munden displays with pistols and rifles. This includes fast draw, card splitting with both pistol and rifle, multiple shot finger fanning, pistol spinning, aerial shooting with handguns, sighting through a diamond ring and much more..
